mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment( comment_idx, user_idx, resinfo_idx, comment_content, comment_star ) VALUES ( #{comment_idx}, #{user_idx}, #{resinfo_idx}, #{comment_content}, #{comment_star} )
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET comment_content = #{comment_content}, comment_star = #{comment_star} WHERE comment_idx = #{comment_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_idx, c.comment_content, c.comment_star, u.user_nickname, u.user_icon, c.comment_time FROM comment c , resinfo r, user u WHERE r.resinfo_idx=c.resinfo_idx and u.user_idx = c.user_idx and r.resinfo_idx=#{resinfo_idx}
select count(*) from comment where resinfo_idx=#{resinfo_idx}

SELECT c.resinfo_idx, r.resinfo_name,c.comment_time,comment_content,c.comment_star,l.location_name ,r.resinfo_mainphoto from comment c , user u ,resinfo r ,location l where c.user_idx = u.user_idx and l.location_idx = r.location_idx and c.resinfo_idx = r.resinfo_idx and u.user_idx = #{user_idx}
